<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Event Registration ">c9a8d083c3a91210fe51ba2ed40131d9</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1ece3c43c36d1210fe51ba2ed401310e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>another User - false</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue === oldValue) {
        return;
    }

    // Obtenha o valor do checkbox 'another_user'
    var another = g_form.getValue('another_user');

    if (another === 'false') {
        // Define o valor do campo 'full_name' quando o checkbox está marcado
        g_form.setValue('full_name', 'xxx');
		g_form.setValue('email', 'xxx');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-03 02:49:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2263c50bc36d1210fe51ba2ed4013109</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>another User - false</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Event Registration" source="x_1444656_event_0">32032ffac3651210fe51ba2ed401311f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Event Registration">32032ffac3651210fe51ba2ed401311f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2263c50bc36d1210fe51ba2ed4013109</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-03 02:49:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
